name: Payment Gateway – 2Checkout for WooCommerce
author: Emran Ahmed

sections.installation:
Automatic Installation From WordPress Dashboard

  1. Login to your WordPress admin panel
  2. Navigate to Plugins -> Add New
  3. Search Payment Gateway – 2Checkout for WooCommerce
  4. Click install and activate respectively.

Manual Installation From WordPress Dashboard

If your server is not connected to the Internet, then you can use this method-

  1. Download the plugin by clicking on the red button above. A ZIP file will be downloaded.
  2. Login to your site’s admin panel and navigate to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload.
  3. Click choose file, select the plugin file and click install

Install Using FTP

If you are unable to use any of the methods due to internet connectivity and file permission issues, then you can use this method-

  1. Download the plugin by clicking on the red button above. A ZIP file will be downloaded.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Launch your favorite FTP client. Such as FileZilla, FireFTP, CyberDuck etc. If you are a more advanced user, then you can use SSH too.
  4. Upload the folder to wp-content/plugins/
  5. Log in to your WordPress dashboard.
  6. Navigate to Plugins -> Installed
  7. Activate the plugin
sections.changelog:
3.0.0

  • WooCommerce High-performance order storage Supported.
  • WooCommerce Checkout Block Supported.
  • Add: Support SHA2/SHA3 algorithm. 2Checkout will stop supporting the MD5 algorithm in their platform on the 15th of April, 2024.
  • Add: WP 6.4+ and WC 8.6+ compatibility

2.0.7

  • Update: WP 5.8 and WC 5.6 compatibility

2.0.6

  • Update: WP 5.1 and WC 5.7 compatibility

2.0.5

  • Update: Admin markup modified

2.0.4

  • Add: WP 5.6 and WC 5.0 Support
  • Update: Use 2Checkout API version 6

2.0.3

  • Add: WP 5.6 and WC 4.8 Support

2.0.2

  • Add: Gateway Icon Width option

2.0.1

  • Fix: Always demo messages shown on order note.

2.0.0

  • Support 2Checkout version 2.

1.0.3

  • Show Message if order id is not available.

1.0.2

  • WooCommerce 3.4 Support

1.0.1

  • Extra checking option added

1.0.0

  • Initial release
sections.description:
2Checkout Payment Gateway for WooCommerce allow to accept online store payment from Paypal, Credit Card, MasterCard and more.

How To Set up 2Checkout Payment Gateway for WooCommerce In WordPress

2Checkout Payment Gateway for WooCommerce is incredible online payment gateway allows to accept payment on WooCommerce powered store from PayPal, Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, American Express, Diners, JCB, PIN debit cards with the Visa or MasterCard logo, Debit cards with the Visa or MasterCard log.

2Checkout is an incredible, seamless, reliable and secured payment gateway to accept payment online and allows mobile payment from buyers worldwide with localized payment options. The payment method includes PCI compliance, merchant account, international fraud prevention, pre-integrated payments gateway and integration with more than 100 shopping carts.

2Checkout support 200+ markets through 8 payment method, 87 currencies, 15 languages and trusted by 50k+ merchants worldwide.

Withdrawing fund is easy in 2Checkout. You can get paid many of currencies and plenty of methods including Electronic Funds Transfer that goes directly to your bank accounts, international Wire Transfer, or a 2Checkout branded Payoneer MasterCard.

Basic Features

  • 2Checkout SHA2/SHA3 algorithm supported.
  • WooCommerce Checkout Block supported.
  • WooCommerce High-performance order storage supported.
  • Enable Standard Checkout.
  • Enable/Disable 2Checkout Payment Gateway
  • Accepts Major Credit Cards / Debit Cards, Visa®, MasterCard®, American Express®, Discover®, and PayPal payments.
  • Supports All WooCommerce Product Types.
  • Customized Payment Gateway Icons
  • Edit Payment Gateway Title
  • Edit Payment Gateway Description
  • Enable Demo Sell Mode
  • Enable Debugging
  • Well coded with best practices in mind.
  • No technical skills needed.
  • Easy to use and customize.

PREMIUM FEATURES OF PAYMENT GATEWAY – 2CHECKOUT FOR WOOCOMMERCE

Upgrade to PRO | Documentation | Support

  • WooCommerce Checkout Block supported.
  • Support WooCommerce Subscription. Both simple and variable subscription.
  • Enable Inline/Popup Checkout.
  • Refund Sales from WordPress Admin
  • Top Notch Customer Support

Thumbs up! I started out with a free version and purchased the Pro add-on a day later. It's perfect - looks great and provides excellent UX. 2CO settings needed to be fine-tuned and the team behind the plugin took great care of me. Thank you Ahmed!

Works with latest version of 2co API

By PickPlugins (pickplugins) on April 24, 2020

Perfectly working with latest version of 2co API and easy to setup, their support team also very professional & helpful to fix issue. Best wishes.
